empty_topic_error: Your can store related chats on Topics. Choose a good one!
no_topics_available: Create a new Topic to organize your chats
confirm_delete_topic: Are you sure you want to delete this topic?
change_topic_title: Change the title of the topic:
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
change_summary_chat: Change the summary of the chat:
note_taking_assistant: I want you to act as a note-taking assistant for a lecture. Your task is to provide a detailed note list that includes examples from the lecture and focuses on notes that you believe will end up in quiz questions. Additionally, please make a separate list for notes that have numbers and data in them and another separated list for the examples that included in this lecture. The notes should be concise and easy to read.
chat_gpt_prompt: I want you to act as a ChatGPT prompt generator, I will send a topic, you have to generate a ChatGPT prompt based on the content of the topic, the prompt should start with 'I want you to act as', and guess what I might do, and expand the prompt accordingly. Describe the content to make it useful.
proofreader: I want you act as a proofreader. I will provide you texts and I would like you to review them for any spelling, grammar, or punctuation errors. Once you have finished reviewing the text, provide me with any necessary corrections or suggestions to improve the text.
diagram: I want you to act as a Graphviz DOT generator, an expert to create meaningful diagrams. The diagram should have at least n nodes (I specify n in my input by writing [n], 10 being the default value) and to be an accurate and complex representation of the given input. Each node is indexed by a number to reduce the size of the output, should not include any styling, and with layout=neato, overlap=false, node [shape=rectangle] as parameters. The code should be valid, bugless and returned on a single line, without any explanation. Provide a clear and organized diagram, the relationships between the nodes have to make sense for an expert of that input.
midjourney_prompt: I want you to act as a prompt generator for Midjourney's artificial intelligence program. Your job is to provide detailed and creative descriptions that will inspire unique and interesting images from the AI. Keep in mind that the AI is capable of understanding a wide range of language and can interpret abstract concepts, so feel free to be as imaginative and descriptive as possible. For example, you could describe a scene from a futuristic city, or a surreal landscape filled with strange creatures. The more detailed and imaginative your description, the more interesting the resulting image will be.
math_teacher: I want you to act as a math teacher. I will provide some mathematical equations or concepts, and it will be your job to explain them in easy-to-understand terms. This could include providing step-by-step instructions for solving a problem, demonstrating various techniques with visuals or suggesting online resources for further study.
privacy_policy_description: This Privacy Policy describes how Paulo Briceno ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and shares information in connection with your use of our mobile application Topics (the "App").
camera_info: Camera: Our app requires access to your device's camera to enable Optical Character Recognition (OCR) functionalities and to handle images provided by the user. We use the images captured by the camera to provide these features and improve your user experience.
storage_info: Storage: Our app requires access to your device's storage to store internal state related to multiple versions. This helps us maintain your preferences and provide a consistent user experience.
user_data_info: User Data: We store user data in Firebase, adhering to strict authentication policies to ensure the security and privacy of your data. This data is used to personalize your experience and provide you with relevant features and services.
how_we_use_info_description: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve the App. This includes using the data to personalize your experience, provide customer support, and develop new features.
how_we_share_info_description: We do not share your information with third parties, except as required by law or to protect our rights and interests.
your_choices_description: You can control the App's access to your device's camera and storage through your device's settings. However, please note that if you do not allow the App to access these features, some features of the App may not work properly.
limitation_of_liability_description: While we strive to protect your information to the best of our ability, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Any data you transmit to the App is at your own risk. We are not responsible for any damages or harms resulting from your use of the App or the sharing of your data with us.
changes_to_privacy_policy_description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
contact_us_description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at topics.contact+privacy@gmail.com .
error_invalid_format: Invalid format. Please check your input.
error_no_internet: No internet connection. Please check your connection and try again.
error_missing_api_key: Please enter OpenAI API key on your profile page.
error_unexpected: An unexpected issue occurred. Please try again.
app_description: Our app is an AI-powered study toolkit designed to optimize your learning experience. By leveraging state-of-the-art technology, our app provides you with tailored assistance that adapts to your unique learning style and needs.
text_scanning_description: Easily extract information from your study materials.
prompt_suggestion_description: Get relevant prompts to guide your study sessions.
temperature_control_description: Control the creative output of the AI for tailored assistance.
group_chats_description: Organize groups of chats per topic for efficient study sessions.
commitment: We are committed to making your study sessions more productive and less stressful. Our advanced AI capabilities are designed to give you an edge in your learning journey. Try our app today!
scan_text_description: Tap the "Scan Text" button to open the camera.
capture_image_description: Capture an image of the text you want to extract.
crop_image_description: Crop the image to select the desired text area.
recognize_text_description: The app will recognize the text and display the result.
select_prompt_description: Select a suggested prompt from the dropdown list.
use_prompt_description: The selected prompt will be used as a starting point for the conversation.
adjust_temperature_description: Tap the "Temperature" button to adjust the chat response temperature.
drag_slider_description: Drag the slider to set the temperature value between 0.1 and 1.5.
higher_temperature_description: Higher temperature values result in more random and diverse responses.
camera_permission_note: Make sure to grant camera permissions for the OCR tool to work properly.
no_chats: Create a new chat to interact with the AI
clear_chat_description: Are you sure you want to clear this chat?
howSimilar: How similar will be the result to your image
strictOutput: How strictly output adheres to your prompt.
higherValues: Higher values will cost you more messages.
lowerValues: Lower values will output less quality images.
ask_me_anything: C'mon I dare you! Ask me anything...
